General.Name: Hunyvers SA
General.Description: Hunyvers SA engages in the sale of new and used recreational vehicles of various brands. The company provides maintenance and services, such as oil change, overhaul, repairs, tires, sealing, electricity, bodywork, and tailor-made layout, as well as installation of accessories. It also offers insurance and credit services; and rents motorhomes. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Limoges, France.
